address: Phường Cốc Lếu, Thành phố Lào Cai, Tỉnh Lào Cai
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Phường Cốc Lếu"**

My initial task was to determine the new administrative unit for "Phường Cốc Lếu, Thành phố Lào Cai, Tỉnh Lào Cai." I approached this systematically, starting with the provincial resolutions. I quickly confirmed that "Tỉnh Lào Cai" remains "Tỉnh Lào Cai," even after the potential merger mentioned in Resolution 60-NQ/TW. This was a straightforward confirmation.

The key to the problem was Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically its sections on the reorganization of communes in Lào Cai province. Line 90 of this resolution was crucial. It explicitly states that "Phường Cốc Lếu" is merged, along with several other wards and communes, into the new "Phường Lào Cai." Line 89, dealing with the formation of "Phường Cam Đường", didn't include "Phường Cốc Lếu," further solidifying this conclusion. I also double-checked the list of wards *not* rearranged, ensuring "Phường Cốc Lếu" wasn't on that list, and it wasn't.

Finally, I cross-referenced this finding with the provided "New Wards Data." This confirmed that the ward code "02647" corresponds to the new "Phường Lào Cai" within "Tỉnh Lào Cai." Other new wards, like "Phường Cam Đường," were irrelevant to my analysis of "Phường Cốc Lếu".

Given the explicit wording of the resolution, my confidence in this result is very high. I am confident that "Phường Cốc Lếu" is now part of the new "Phường Lào Cai." The data I would provide would clearly cite Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 90 as the key source for this information, ensuring the user can easily verify my findings.

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 90. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Duyên Hải, Cốc Lếu, Kim Tân, Lào Cai, xã Vạn Hòa và xã Bản Phiệt thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Lào Cai.
